original_text: Therefore consider carefully how you listen. Whoever has will be given more; whoever does not have, even what they think they have will be taken from them.”
korean_text: 그러므로 너희가 어떻게 들을까 스스로 삼가라 누구든지 있는 자는 받겠고 없는 자는 그 있는 줄로 아는 것까지도 빼앗기리라 하시니라

sentences.original_text: Therefore consider carefully how you listen.
Whoever has will be given more;
whoever does not have, even what they think they have will be taken from them.
sentences.korean_translation: 없는 자는 있는 줄로 아는 것마저 빼앗기리라.
